Sentencas: Ni/NiFe2 dual layer coating is fabricated to improve the performance of SUS 430 steel as solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) interconnects by a combined approach.
Titulo: Comparison of electroplating and sputtering Ni for Ni/NiFe2 dual layer coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect

Sentencas: Ni layer is deposited by electroplating or magnetron sputtering, and subsequently the NiFe2 layer is sputtered on it.
Titulo: Comparison of electroplating and sputtering Ni for Ni/NiFe2 dual layer coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect

Sentencas: The coated steels are evaluated at 800 degrees C in air corresponding to SOFC cathode environment.
Titulo: Comparison of electroplating and sputtering Ni for Ni/NiFe2 dual layer coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect

Sentencas: It is found that the coating with electroplated Ni and sputtered NiFe2 results in breakaway oxidation after 5 weeks.
Titulo: Comparison of electroplating and sputtering Ni for Ni/NiFe2 dual layer coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect

Sentencas: Preoxidation treatment in 900 degrees C air for electroplated Ni steel prior to depositing NiFe2 layer improves oxidation resistance.
Titulo: Comparison of electroplating and sputtering Ni for Ni/NiFe2 dual layer coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect

Sentencas: The sputtered Ni and NiFe2 sample exhibits superior oxidation resistance and inhibition against Cr outward migration while maintaining a low area-specific resistance (ASR) of surface scale.
Titulo: Comparison of electroplating and sputtering Ni for Ni/NiFe2 dual layer coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect

Sentencas: Comparative analyses of the coating preparation and resultant oxidation behavior with possible mechanisms and implications are discussed.
Titulo: Comparison of electroplating and sputtering Ni for Ni/NiFe2 dual layer coating on ferritic stainless steel interconnect
